synopsis.text:
Sister s of Jupiter, divine entities once responsible for sealing Old Hell, are now scattered, each taking refuge within the hearts of girls previously aided by Keima Katsuragi, the 'God of Conquest.' Tasked by the goddess Diana, who resides within his childhood friend Tenri Ayukawa, Keima embarks on a mission to reunite these sisters to vanquish the runaway spirits and free himself from his exorcising duties. However, the sinister organization Vintage is on a hunt for these goddesses, turning Keima's quest into a desperate race against time.

As Keima revisits the girls he had once charmed, he must navigate the complexities of their hearts once more, while also confronting the consequences of his past actions. With the stakes higher than ever, Keima, alongside his demon companions Elsie and Haqua, must outwit Vintage to save the captured goddess and restore the divine power needed to put an end to this supernatural chaos. In this thrilling adventure, Keima's gaming expertise will be put to the ultimate test in the real world, as he fights to protect the girls he once loved and save humanity from the impending darkness.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
